name: The Secret Of The Spiders
description:
The first game on internet by "Hussain I Creations & Co".

Defeat the baddie spiders on your way . Travel through Forest,Beach,and more.The first map "The Inn" , meet many new characters and know what to do and how to play.

Conquest the great "Necronomancer"in the mansion.Do the second mission of

Kolabangra thought you by Mr.Necronomanceran.Meet ghostly creatures and two boss battle , meet the Werewolf created by Necronomancer and meet Hydronomancer,Conmanmancer,Flameonmancer,Waterdianmancer,Deathicemancer and more.

Awesome graphics and 2d excellent game

The game of interest made by "Hussain Masooma Bandokwala".

Wait for the new version till October 2015 for the new game "The Secret Of The Spiders : Xenom"

Meet the heros Eric Davidson,Jojo Foxilite Macfor,and more.
